data.current_summary: Add restrictions to a PDF
data.current_description: Add restrictions to prevent copying, printing, and modifying a PDF document.
data.summary_suggestion: Add security restrictions to PDF document
data.description_suggestion: Add security restrictions to a PDF document to prevent copying, printing, and modifying. The original document remains unchanged; a new restricted version is generated.

data.current_summary: Remove the restrictions from a PDF

data.reasoning: Summary is adequate, but description is too minimal.
